title: 命令错误
author: 彪悍的新手
txt_content:
/scoreboard players tag @e add Stone3 {Item:{id:"minecraft:flint",Count:2}}复制代码怎么错了
用探测的话只显示1个实体（除去玩家）

replies.author: rooke_zb
replies.txt_content: 如果是玩家的话是/scoreboard players tag @e add Stone3 {Inventory:[{Slot:槽位b,id:物品ID,Damage:损失值s,Count:数量b,tag:{其他NBT}}]}复制代码详见http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=244552
